text: "Good Life" is a 2010 song by American pop rock band OneRepublic and is taken from their second studio album Waking Up (2009). It went to number 5 in Canada, number 8 in Luxembourg and the United States, number 9 in Austria, number 14 in Switzerland, number 19 in Denmark and Germany, number 22 in New Zealand, number 25 in the Netherlands, number 41 in Ireland and Sweden and number 47 in Italy. It charted poorly in Australia where it made #62. == Track listing == *CD single Digital download #"Good Life" (new mix version) – 4:05 #"Good Life" (Demolition Crew remix) – 4:12 *Digital download — remix #"Good Life" (featuring B.o.B) – 3:50 == References == Category:2010 songs Category:OneRepublic songs
title: Good Life (OneRepublic song)
